snippet.title: Terror-Daktil 4D - ZX Spectrum Gameplay (Steam re-release)
snippet.description:
Originally released in 1983 for the ZX Spectrum, Terror-Daktil 4D gave players a unique twist on the traditional arcade shooter, as they must carefully aim arcing shots at flocks of enemies. The game also contains an opening cinematic cutscene - a rarity for early 80s computer games.

Survive for six days and six nights by firing arcing shots from your cannon at the fearsome Terror-Daktils.

Developed by Beam Software
Published by Melbourne House
Footage captured from the Steam re-release by Pixel Games UK
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2005020/TerrorDaktil_4D/

#zxspectrum #zxspectrumgames #pixelgamesuk #retrogames #retrogaming #steam #steamgames #steamgame #terrordaktil4d #beamsoftware #melbournehouse
